PREFIX dcat: <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#>
PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>

DELETE
	{	?s ?p ?o }
INSERT
	{ 	?news ?p ?o }
WHERE
	{ 	?s ?p ?o .
		?s a dcat:Distribution .
		BIND ( STR(?s) as ?strs )
		BIND ( IRI(CONCAT("http://data.gov.be/dist/vlaanderen/", MD5(?strs))) 
				as ?news )
	}
